article.title: Relativistic Newtonian Dynamics for Objects and Particles

multiple_choice_question.text: In Figure 1, what does the variable "ro" represent?
choices: The Schwarzschild radius of the Sun.
The distance from point A to point B.
The distance of closest approach of the trajectory to the Sun.
The impact parameter of the trajectory.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the dashed line in Figure 1 represent?
choices: The trajectory of a massive object.
The actual path of the massless photon.
A straight-line approximation of the photon\'s path.
The direction of the gravitational force at point P.
The total energy of the system.

multiple_choice_question.text: What physical phenomenon does formula (28) describe?
choices: The precession of the perihelion of Mercury.
The Shapiro time delay of light passing a massive object.
The bending of light by a gravitational field.
